name: Stewie
description: A young baby born from Lois and Peter who has a weird British accent, his best friend is the dog Brian and he enjoys making inventions and is a reformed evil villain also kinda fruity.

name: Peter
description: A middle aged man that works at a brewery and has to deal with his family. He is not that smart but that doesn't stop him from having a fun time.

name: Chris
description: A young lad from Boston son of Peter and Lois, he attends Quahog high as a junior.He likes to wear his hat, has very peculiar hobbies.

name: Glenn (Quagmire)
description: Quagmire is a respected pilot and good neighbor. He is one of peter's best friends in the show and he has a way with the ladies.

name: Joe
description: Joe was a respected cop, now he's just a cop. He became paralyzed after an undercover job went wrong. He is a family man with two kids adn he doesn't let his disability hold him back.

name: Al Harrington
description: Al Harrington is the owner, president and CEO of Al Harrington's Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm-Flailing Tubeman Emporium and Warehouse', located off of Route 2 in Weekapaug, Rhode Island.

name: Johnathan Herbert
description: Herbert is the local veteran in Quahog. He fought in World War 2 as a fighter pilot, and is now living out his retirement in Quahog with his dog Jessie. He is widely known and loved by all of the community.

name: Cleveland Brown
description: Cleveland has been peter's best-friend since he was a teenager, he also moved for about 4 years to try and make his own tv show, and in that time he remarried to his childhood crush after his first wife divorced him. He has 2 sons and a daughter.
